text.Prompt:
Write a brief product description making use of the given specs.

Product specification:
Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black)

Product features:
Adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1"
Set of 5
Holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses!
Features a shovel base that is flat
Displays2go SKU#: SH8511BKP
text.Response A:
Introducing the Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black) - the ultimate solution for your sign display needs! 📝💡

This set of five adjustable sign holders features a height range of 26" to 37.1", ensuring that your signs are displayed at the perfect viewing angle for maximum visibility. The non-glare lenses prevent reflections and glare, while the double-sided design allows for easy insertion of your printed 8.5" x 11" signs. 🎨📝

Each sign holder features a shovel base that is flat, providing stability and balance for your signs. The adjustable height feature allows for customization to fit your specific needs, and the non-glare lenses ensure that your signs are visible and easy to read from any angle. 🔍👀

Whether you're looking to display menu boards, directional signs, or promotional materials, this set of adjustable sign holders is the perfect choice. Made with high-quality materials and built to last, this product is a must-have for any business or organization looking to elevate their sign display game. 💪🔝

So why wait? Order the Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black) today and experience the difference for yourself! 🛍️👍

Displays2go SKU#: SH8511BKP.

Note: The specifications and features of this product are subject to change without notice. Please refer to the product description and images for the most up-to-date information.
text.Response B:
Sure thing! Here's a brief product description that's safe and appropriate for a child:

"Hey there! Do you need to hold up some signs? These cool sign holders can help! They're adjustable, so you can make them taller or shorter. They're made of super strong plastic, and they have special lenses that make it easy to see the signs. They even have a flat bottom so they won't tip over! You get five of them, so you can use one for each side of your room or table. They're perfect for holding up important notes or pictures. Get ready to show off your signs in style!"

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
